bibl.title: A New Sapphic Intertext in Horace.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: This article argues for a connection between Sappho's 'Charaxus Poem' (= LDAB 341738) and Horace C. 1.9.9-12. Horace's lines rework the third stanza of Sappho's poem, with consequences both for how Horace presents himself in this poem, and for his wider relation to the Lesbian poets. - Pp. 388-389: G.O. Hutchinson, Appendix. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tom Philips, A New Sapphic Intertext in Horace.

This article argues for a connection between Sappho's 'Charaxus Poem' (= LDAB 341738) and Horace C. 1.9.9-12. Horace's lines rework the third stanza of Sappho's poem, with consequences both for how Horace presents himself in this poem, and for his wider relation to the Lesbian poets. - Pp. 388-389: G.O. Hutchinson, Appendix. - Avec résumé en anglais.
